titleInfo.title: Christian Brothers College High School Class, 1920

mods.abstract: Class members were: Walter Bassett, Willie Best, Eddie Cummins, A.J. Doley, J.K. McDermott, Pat McHugh, W. Moore, C. O'Brien, J.F. O'Reilly, John Pelegrin, Andrew Pera, Joseph Rutschman, L.D. Wade, and Walter Walsh
